channel.title: CVE Feed for py-bcrypt -- py-bcrypt
channel.description: The latest CVEs for py-bcrypt -- py-bcrypt

item.title: CVE-2013-1895|2024-08-06T15:20:37.112Z -- py-bcrypt -- py-bcrypt
item.description: The py-bcrypt module before 0.3 for Python does not properly handle concurrent memory access, which allows attackers to bypass authentication via multiple authentication requests, which trigger the password hash to be overwritten.
